ai.title: AI That Understands Teaching Needs
ai.description: Boost your creativity and productivity with our AI assistant that helps generate high-quality educational content in seconds.
ai.details: Powered by cutting-edge artificial intelligence, our tool helps you generate quality educational content faster than ever. Simply describe the material you need, and our AI can produce exams, lesson texts, multiple-choice questions, and even graphs to enrich your documents. It saves you time while ensuring that your content stays accurate, engaging, and well-structured. Whether you need a full exam or just inspiration for a lesson, AI is here to assist you at every step.

editor.title: Rich Editing Tools for Educators
editor.description: Design rich educational content with LaTeX equations, graphics, images, and structured exam questions — all in one place.
editor.details: Our intuitive editing interface allows you to seamlessly write LaTeX-style equations, create graphics, insert images, and build structured exam questions. Whether you are preparing complex mathematical material, graphics, or standard multiple-choice tests, our platform provides everything you need to craft professional and polished educational documents.

pdf.title: Create Printable PDFs for the Classroom
pdf.description: Export all your educational content — from full exams to complete course materials — in beautiful, ready-to-print PDF format.
pdf.details: Our platform allows you to export any content you create, whether it’s a structured exam, a full lesson, or a combination of both, into clean, professional-looking PDFs. Everything is automatically formatted to fit standard A4 pages, ensuring a polished appearance that’s easy to print and distribute in physical classrooms. No extra formatting is needed — just create, export, and you’re ready to teach or share your materials instantly.

save.title: Save your work and come back later
save.description: Save your progress securely and pick up right where you left off anytime with your personal account.
save.details: With a simple account creation, you can save all your documents and access them later from any device. Whether you’re drafting a new project or refining existing materials, your work is always safe and ready to be resumed whenever you need it. No more lost ideas or wasted time: everything stays organized and accessible, making your workflow smooth and stress-free.

comingSoon.title: More to come
comingSoon.description: We’re just getting started — exciting new features and enhancements are coming soon!

authentification.password-format-wrong: Password needs to be at least 8 characters
authentification.text-email-verification: Enter your email and we'll send you instructions on how to reset your password.
authentification.no-account: You don't have an account yet?
